title: iMac Colors (Yum)
music: The Rolling Stones - She's a Rainbow
summary: Apple's 'Yum' campaign introduced five iMac G3 colours: Blueberry, Grape, Lime, Strawberry, and Tangerine. The iconic poster featuring all five 'flavours' became a collector's item. The iMac G3 won the 1999 D&AD Gold Award.
